title: Iceye, Satlantis to collaborate on Tandem4EO constellation
key_assets: Tandem4EO constellation (4 satellites: 2 Iceye SAR satellites + 2 Satlantis optical satellites)
High-resolution radar and optical imagery capabilities
summary: Iceye and Satlantis announced a partnership to develop the Tandem4EO constellation, comprising four satellites (two Iceye SAR satellites and two Satlantis optical satellites) flying in formation to provide high-resolution radar and optical imagery. The collaboration aims to bolster Spain’s New Space sector and enhance Earth observation capabilities for applications like natural disaster monitoring, security, and infrastructure development.
why_it_matters: This partnership strengthens Europe’s Earth observation capabilities by combining SAR and optical imagery, supports the growth of Spain’s New Space ecosystem, and demonstrates the potential of public-private collaboration in advancing satellite technology for commercial and institutional applications.
